name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Window Shopper: log any page's globals

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Count & list all page-defined global variables

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Usage:
The extension's icon badge shows how many globals are defined on a page. Click the icon to log a list of all page-defined global variables to the console.

Licence: MIT

Project page: https://github.com/rileyjshaw/window-shopper
